reviewText: Afro Samurai is a great anime with a very nice story and well designed characters. It also has it's comical moments and it is very very action packed. I watched this on a 42inch Insignia and the video quality is stunning. Audio also sounds great. Highly recommend this for anime fan, action fans, or anyone who wants a good well developed story with lots of blood, carnage and revenge.Disc 1 Contains the first 5 episodes which is Afro Samurai: Season 1 and Disc 2 contains the movie Afro Samurai:Resurrection.If you own the previous version of these on Blu-ray, there is no reason to buy this. The special features are basically the same. Also, i noticed that the afro samurai individual releases came with artwork booklet while this release came with no booklet, it only has a slipcover instead and different artwork for the disc

reviewText: Amazon recommends that you buy this ALONG withAfro Samurai: Season One - Director's Cut [Blu-ray] andAfro Samurai: Resurrection (Director's Cut/ Blu-ray). That's what I ended up doing. Thing is, though, that all this is is both of those two sets together. Buy EITHER season one & Resurrection together, OR get the Complete Murder Sessions, there's no reason for both, unless you want to keep either/or in the shrink wrap as a collector's piece, which really isn't such a bad idea.
